audubon 0.0.1.9000
  • Reference

    audubon

    audubon is an R package for various Japanese text processing that contains:

    • wrapper functions of hakatashi/japanese.js
    • wrapper functions of yumetodo/romaji_kana_cvt_rust (an Roman and Hiragana inverter following the JIS X 4063:2000)
    • an R port of SudachiCharNormalizer
    • and other miscellaneous functions

    System Requirements

    • Cargo

    Installation

    remotes::install_github("paithio909/audubon")
